Package pyxmpp :: Package jabber :: Module vcard :: Class VCardXString
[hide private]

Class VCardXString

source code

VCardField --+    
             |    
   VCardString --+
                 |
                VCardXString

Generic class for all text vCard fields not defined in RFC 2426.

In the RFC 2425 representation field name will be prefixed with 'x-'.
